name: @callstack/react-theme-provider

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf lib && npm run build:standalone && npm run build:babel
scripts.build:babel: flow-copy-source src lib --ignore **/*.test.js && babel src/ --out-dir lib/ --ignore src/__tests__
scripts.example: yarn link && cd examples/web && yarn link @callstack/react-theme-provider && yarn start
